topicSummary: Tamoxifen is an anti-oestrogen drug licensed for the treatment of breast cancer and anovulatory infertility.

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Tamoxifen - managing adverse effects: Summary

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in October 2014 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key RCTs published since the last revision of this topic. The scope of the topic has been changed to cover the general prescribing information on tamoxifen, and the topic structure has been changed to reflect this.
